title: There will rise a star where famine will occur & on 15 Ramadan trumpet will blow True? assimalhakeem
transcript: foreign food for one year because there will come a Great Famine and on 15 Ramadan I don't know in which year of Ramadan but it is said that a trumpet blast will occur and people are safe to stay home and 70 000 people will live and and and so many things so are this statement true or fabricated this issues it is all fabricated and parts of what the soothsayers are saying believing them and and thinking that people know the Unseen is kuffer so you have to ignore such statements and not pay attention to it
